verbose_text: Compared with the siEzrin group, the mRNA and protein expression levels of Ezrin, vimentin and N-cadherin in the miR-183-5p inhibitor + siEzrin group were significantly increased, whereas the mRNA and protein expression levels of E-cadherin and beta-catenin were significantly decreased in the miR-183-5p inhibitor + siEzrin group (all P < 0.05).
